abstract: Levy-Izhak Rosenbaum pleads guilty in federal court to brokering three illegal kidney transplants for people in New Jersey in exchange for payments of $120,000 or more; conviction is first under federal statute banning sales of kidneys by paid donors.
snippet: Levy-Izhak Rosenbaum admitted in federal court on Thursday to brokering sales of kidneys to people in New Jersey who needed transplants.
lead_paragraph: Levy-Izhak Rosenbaum admitted in federal court on Thursday to brokering sales of kidneys to people in New Jersey who needed transplants.

headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea To Charges Of Selling Kidneys
